A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'd like to preface this by saying I enjoyed TFA. The Last Jedi was a huge slap in the face. Rian eviscerated Luke Skywalker. I now understand why Mark Hamill made the comment that he fundamentally disagreed with Rian Johnson portrayal of Luke. I agree with Mark. The numerous plot holes also and terrible writing decisions have pretty much sealed the deal for me. I'm in agreement with my wife that our family (3 kids) will not be involved in this franchise any longer. #RianRuinedSW
